name: Drink Making Sim
description:
My original upload https://www.construct.net/en/free-online-games/drink-making-sim-update-38892/pla..

how to play:

R for red C for cream K for orange M for chocolate mix B for blue drink you can also mix drinks to make new ones also O for oil L for lemon (hit it with a hammer and auto mixer to get juice same with lime) i for lime
